title: Magic Dust Watch Face
summary: Beautiful, dynamic particles watch face for Android Wear.
description: Something new. Extraordinary. Simple and outstanding.Enjoy this ultra-minimalistic watch face with beautiful, dynamic particles.Magic Dust has several individually designed skins for you to choose:- Original skin - an analog watch with mesmerazing hands that arise and die in an infinite loop,- Meteora skin - another analog one that will make you feel like in cosmic space, chasing comets,- Black Hole skin - analog watch with a ring of escaping particles,- Implosion skin - analog watch with a ring of collapsing particles,- Ninja skin - a classic digital face with sparkling, simple background. (12 and 24 hour time formats available)With v1.2 you can choose hybrid skins for analog watches that add little digital clock in the center.Now you can enjoy dynamic particles not only on your smartwatch, but also on the phone. Introducing: live Magic Dust wallpaper!Designed for Android Wear.Supports Android Wear 2.0.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
Something new. Extraordinary. Simple and outstanding.
Enjoy this ultra-minimalistic watch face with beautiful, dynamic particles.

Magic Dust has several individually designed skins for you to choose:
- Original skin - an analog watch with mesmerazing hands that arise and die in an infinite loop,
- Meteora skin - another analog one that will make you feel like in cosmic space, chasing comets,
- Black Hole skin - analog watch with a ring of escaping particles,
- Implosion skin - analog watch with a ring of collapsing particles,
- Ninja skin - a classic digital face with sparkling, simple background. (12 and 24 hour time formats available)

With v1.2 you can choose hybrid skins for analog watches that add little digital clock in the center.

Now you can enjoy dynamic particles not only on your smartwatch, but also on the phone. Introducing: live Magic Dust wallpaper!

Designed for Android Wear.
Supports Android Wear 2.0.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+

comments: Looks great on my G watch R! After purchase I had to resync everything, and restart both the phone and the watch, but this watch face showed up eventually and it's looking great. Keep up the great work Meciej! Blessings on you and your family.
1 star because you use push notifications for ads to other products. I am also reporting you to google for this. I paid for this so I can have a watch face not to have adware on my phone!
Great watch face looks cool on my urbane 2.is it possible to add hour markers or minute markers on next update?I know its suppose to look mimilistic but it would make it better.
Yup Gets another star when add more themes and or color options
Please add more skins and animations
Noice! Extremely minimal and animated.  Just perfect for the G Watch R.
recentChanges: Support for Android Wear 2.0 (standalone watch face),
New hybrid skins - add digital clock to the analog skins,
New time ticks option - one more option to customize your watchface.
